description: Anti-unit siege weapon. Fires bolts that pierce multiple units. Strong vs. large groups of units. Weak vs. cavalry and siege weapons.

name: Scout Cavalry
description: Fast cavalry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion. Strong vs. Monks. Weak vs. Pikemen and Camel Riders.

name: Serjeant
description: Sicilian unique infantry unit which can construct Donjons.
special: Can build and repair Donjons. Stats improve on each age up. Build/repair 25% slower in Feudal Age.

name: Sharkatzor
description: Cheat unit.

name: Sheep
description: Can be picked up by player and used to scout. Provides 100 food.

name: Shotel Warrior
description: Ethiopian unique infantry with high attack and fast training speed. Fast-moving. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. archers.

name: Shrivamsha Rider
description: Gurjara unique light cavalry unit which can dodge projectiles. Will not dodge splash damage. Strong vs. archers. Weak vs. Pikemen and Camel Riders.
special: Can "dodge" five (seven for Elite) consecutive projectiles in a 20 second time frame

name: Siege Elephant
description: A mounted siege unit with high HP.
special: Cannot be converted from distance

name: Siege Onager
description: Ranged siege weapon with area of effect attack, but cannot attack enemies at close range. Strong vs. tight groups of units. Can attack ground and destroy trees.

name: Siege Ram
description: Anti-building siege weapon. Resistant to most ranged attacks. Garrisoned infantry increase speed and attack.

name: Siege Tower
description: Anti-building siege weapon. Resistant to most ranged attacks. Garrisoned infantry increase speed and attack.

name: Skirmisher
description: Ranged anti-archer unit that cannot attack at close range. Strong vs. archers. Weak vs. units at close range.

name: Slinger
description: Ranged unit. Strong vs. units at long range. Weak vs. Elite Skirmishers, Mangonels, and units at close range.
expansion: Age of Empires II HD: The Forgotten

name: Spearman
description: Anti-cavalry infantry unit. Strong vs. mounted units, especially elephants. Weak vs. archers and infantry.

name: Steppe Lancer
description: Light cavalry unit with increased attack range. Strong in groups. Weak vs. Camel Riders and archers.

name: Tarkan
description: Hunnic unique cavalry unit with attack bonus vs. buildings. Strong vs. buildings and archers. Weak vs. Pikemen and Camel Riders.

name: Teutonic Knight
description: Teutonic unique infantry unit. Slow and powerful. Strong vs. melee units. Weak vs. archers and Scorpions.

name: Thirisadai
description: Massive warship that fires five arrows at once, and is only available in the Imperial Age

name: Throwing Axeman
description: Frankish unique infantry unit with ranged melee attack. Strong vs. infantry. Weak vs. archers and siege weapons.

name: Tiger
description: Hostile Gaia unit. Provides no food.

name: Trade Cart
description: Used to trade with other players by land. Carries goods from your Market to another player's Market and brings back gold. The farther the Market the higher your profit

name: Trade Cog
description: Movement rate 2.00 with caravan

name: Transport Ship
description: Used to move units across water. Select the units you want to transport, then right-click on the Transport Ship to board them. Use the Unload button to unload units on the shore.

name: Trebuchet
description: Powerful siege weapon used to destroy buildings and walls from long distance. Cannot fire on close units. Must be packed to move and unpacked to attack. Can cut paths through forests. Unpack time: 0:11

name: Trebuchet (packed)
description: Powerful siege weapon used to destroy buildings and walls from long distance. Cannot fire on close units. Must be packed to move and unpacked to attack. Can cut paths through forests. Unpack time: 0:11

name: Turkey
description: Alternative to sheep. Provides 100 food.

name: Turtle Ship
description: Korean unique ship. Slow and ironclad. Strong vs. warships and buildings.

name: Two Handed Swordsman
description: All-purpose infantry unit. Strong vs. buildings and infantry. Weak vs. archers at long range.

name: Urumi Swordsman
description: An infantry unit that charges its attack over a period of time, dealing increased damage on its first attack against an enemy unit, the charged attacks also do trample damage, but not regular attacks.
special: Charges its attack by +12 (+15 Elite) over 24 (20 Elite) seconds, dealing a blast attack of 50% strength in 0.75 tiles radius

name: Villager
description: Gathers resources. Builds and repairs buildings. Also repairs ships and siege weapons.

name: VMDL
description: Cheat unit.

name: War Elephant
description: Persian unique unit. Slow and powerful cavalry. Strong vs. buildings and units at close range. Weak vs. Monks.

name: War Galley
description: All-purpose warship with ranged attack. Weak vs. Fire Ships.

name: Warrior Priest
description: The Warrior Priest is a unique infantry unit of the Armenians
special: Heals units & Carries Relics

name: War Wagon
description: Korean unique cavalry archer unit. Strong vs. infantry and archers. Weak vs. Pikemen, Skirmishers, and Camel Riders.

name: Wild Boar
description: Wild boar. Provides 340 food.

name: Woad Raider
description: Celtic unique infantry unit. Fast-moving. Strong vs. infantry and siege weapons. Weak vs. archers and cavalry.

name: Wolf
description: Wild wolf. Gives no food just kills people. Line of sight also depends on difficulty (4-12 LOS)

name: Xolotl Warrior
description: Mesoamerican cavalry unit. Strong vs. infantry and siege. Weak vs. Pikemen and Camel Riders.

name: Zebra
description: Gaia unit. Provides 140 food.
